resources.string:
Game rules:
Leader and two competitive players. 
Players trying to guess the character presented by a leader during the round time. This player which guess the person correctly first gains one point. The winner is that player wich will have more points that second one at the end of time. 

Before start choose one game variant! 

Game variants:
- Describing people:
Leader try to describe character, but mustn't use words contained in character name.
- Presenting people:
Leader are not allowed to describe character by words, he can only use body language and gestures.

Game rules:
Two competitive teams. Game consist of two rounds.
Teams trying to guess the character presented by a leader during the round time. This player which guess the person correctly gains one point for the team. Meanwhile opposite team waits until the first one ends their round. The winner is that team wich will have more points at the end of game. 

Before start choose one game variant! 

Game variants:
- Describing people:
Leader try to describe character, but mustn't use words contained in character name.
- Presenting people:
Leader are not allowed to describe character by words, he can only use body language and gestures.
